entry.title: Current Conditions: 3.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Rocky Mountain House 7:00 PM MST Saturday 11 February 2023
Temperature: 3.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa rising
Humidity: 39 %
Dewpoint: -9.1°C
Wind: W 12 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly cloudy. High 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High 7. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Low minus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 11 February 2023
